short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize web articles in a professional, concise format using OpenAI's GPT-4 powered AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web article summarizer powered by artificial intelligence. 

Whether for work, school, or quick reading, SumMe is your go-to solution for effortlessly summarizing web articles with the power of OpenAI's GPT-4. 

Simply copy and paste an article's URL, and SumMe will swiftly and concisely summarize the webpage's content. 

This cutting-edge summarization tool is designed to transform lengthy articles into clear, concise, and informative summaries, allowing users to quickly grasp the essence of any content.

SumMe leverages the advanced natural language processing capabilities of GPT-4, ensuring that the generated summaries maintain context, coherence, and accuracy. 

SumMe is your efficient, reliable companion for condensing complex content into digestible summaries.

Features: 
- Leverages the power of GPT-4 AI
- Summarizes web articles with one click
- Provides summaries within seconds
- Professional and concisely formatted
- Copies summaries (and sources) onto clipboard with one click
- Completely free, no ads
